item.description:
Join us for some summer fun and sun at our 40th Annual Cape Cod Weekend down in Dennisport.

Weekend includes:

• Room for Friday and Saturday nights at the Colony Beach Motel located in Dennisport, MA

• Continental breakfast each day

• Lunch and Drinks by the pool on Saturday afternoon

• Barbeque Dinner and Drinks Saturday night (with choice of steak or chicken) and lots of good stuff to eat

The hotel is located right on the ocean with a small beach and also has an outdoor heated pool. Cost varies depending on number of people in your room and what type of room you request.

$147.50/pp based on double-occupancy for a regular room with 2 double beds ($270 for single occupancy)

$172.50/pp based on double occupancy for an efficiency unit with 2 double beds, pullout sofa, and kitchenette ($295 for single occupancy)

This event is not limited to Innitou members, so please feel free to extend the invite to friends, family, and co-workers.

RSVP is required by 4/30/13.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be basking in the sun by the pool or on our private beach

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Innitou 40th Annual Cape Weekend in Dennisport
